summary: A comprehensive test suite for Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) functionality that uses Moto to mock AWS services. It validates core ELB operations such as creating and deleting load balancers, managing listeners, tags, attributes, security groups, SSL certificates, health checks, pagination, availability zones, CloudFormation stack integration, policies, subnet attachments, and server response handling.
business_intent: Ensure that ELB-related code behaves correctly and reliably by exercising all major ELB features in a controlled, mocked environment before deployment to production.
